required_skills.details: Exceeds all Tier 1 requirements. Holds TS/SCI w/ Poly (exceeds requirement), MS CS from Georgia Tech (4.0 GPA), and OSCP. Advanced certifications (OSEP, OSCE3, GXPN) directly map to senior red team duties.

experience_level.details: 8.5 years of directly qualifying OCO and NSA/DCRT-compliant red teaming. Leadership as Technical Director (USSF) and Branch Chief (Army) meets the CSE III seniority bar.

nice_to_have.details: Strong match for ICS/OT (Moonlight Defender) and advanced certs. Missing specific NSA RTO qualification and direct NAVSEA experience.

industry_match.details: Deep military and DoD Red Team background. Experience leading missions to DCRT standards is a near-perfect match for Millennium's support missions.

strengths: Clearance exceeds requirement -- Active TS/SCI with Polygraph is a competitive differentiator that expedites onboarding and provides access to more sensitive missions.
Certifications far exceed the industry bar -- Holds OSCE3, GXPN, and GREM, providing elite expertise in evasion, exploit development, and malware analysis.
NSA/DoD Red Team Compliance -- Explicitly managed and executed operations to 'DoD Certified Red Team (DCRT)' standards.
ICS/OT and Platform-Centric Expertise -- Led 'Moonlight Defender 1 and 2', the first live-satellite purple-team cyber exercises integrating on-orbit systems and ICS/OT networks.
Graduate Degree -- MS Computer Science from Georgia Tech (GPA 4.0) signals strong technical depth and theoretical mastery.

gaps.impact: JD lists this as highly desired for DoD Red Team missions.
gaps.mitigation: Emphasize leadership of operations to DCRT standards and possession of OSCE3/GXPN certifications as superior technical benchmarks.

gaps.area: NAVSEA / US Navy weapon system experience
gaps.mitigation: Bridge this gap using the 'Moonlight Defender' narrative; satellite platform security shares design parallels with naval weapon systems.

red_flags.certification_gap: CLEAR -- OSCP held; elite cert stack (OSCE3, GXPN) exceeds 'highly desired' list.
red_flags.experience_gap: CLEAR -- ~9 years of qualifying OCO and NSA/DCRT experience meets senior requirement.
red_flags.tech_stack_mismatch: CLEAR -- Full overlap on offensive operations, C2 infrastructure, and ICS/OT.
red_flags.location_conflict: NOTED -- Candidate confirmed willingness to relocate to Virginia Beach.

priority_emphasis_areas: DCRT compliance and leadership experience in NSA-certified environments.
Strategic bridging between Space Force weapon systems and Naval weapon systems (Moonlight Defender).
Elite certification depth (OSCE3) as a proxy for RTO technical requirements.
strategic_recommendation: Eric is a top-tier candidate whose profile significantly exceeds the baseline requirements. Recommend immediate application with a focus on 'Strategic Bridging' for naval systems.
